GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v5.10.130
GSD.description:
dmaengine: pl330: Fix lockdep warning about non-static key

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.130 by commit 7b721f5aec92593404e1139fb2f50c266eb24e48, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit e588710311ee5bece284871d613418831d56f2bd. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: dmaengine: pl330: Fix lockdep warning about non-static key
